Thank you soo much for  taking  great care in fixing  my partial flexible dentures. You always  make sure  I'm  comfortable during  each visit  and explain  in a way that I can understand. I'm  grateful for the  way you  help me keep  my smile  healthy.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
On Feb 2021, I visited for RCT and 6 fillings for 3-4 sittings with Dr Radhika Goel at her Kasba clinic. Few days after few of the dental fillings started to wear out ******* ** *** *** ******** **** *** she had to redo it. I took utmost precautions after the procedure also.
But since one month from May my RCT tooth and few teeth started paining and when I checked in the mirror closely I saw few of the dental fillings on the lower teeth done by the doctor are all gone and few of the tooth are exposed again. Yesterday I was having serious pain and I visited one nearby dentist *** ** *********** **** ** ******* * **** **** *** *** ***** ******* ** ****** ****** *** *** ******** *** *** **** ******** ****** *** **** *** ******* ******* **** * **** *** ****** ** ** *** * ** **** *** **** ***** ******* **** **** ** *** ****** ****** *** ********* ****** ***** ****** **** *** ****** *** ** ** ** ********* * *** ** ** ******* ********* ******* **** ** *** ***** ******** ** ** *** ***** ***** ** **** *********** **** ** ***** *** *** ***** ********* ***** * ***** * **** ****** ******** *** ******** ********
I will not recommend this doctor to anyone after my horrible experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I used to be scared of visiting dentists and have had bad experiences earlier. Dr. Goel changed my perception. Now I cannot think of anyone for my dental issues apart from her. She is calm and patience, both in her work and while dealing with the patients as well. Extremely grateful!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Explained the problem in details. Gave options while giving solutions. Soft spoken and handled pain related issues with care üëç

Been here for a dental procedure, and my experience is really good! Dr Goel is a really great Dentist! She is very welcoming and friendly, and has surely made me realize dental procedures can be accessible and hassle-free. She is really calm and completes her diagnosis and procedures by taking the time it needs and keeping patience with her patients! During procedures, she also explained to me each step, and that is wonderful because it kept me informed on my procedure! Her assistant is also really helpful, and they have been really helpful in scheduling and rescheduling my appointments whenever I couldn't be present due to work. Dr Goel's guidance regarding other procedures has also been helpful. And I'm definitely gonna come back for other procedures as well!
Thanks a lot Dr. Goel and Dentotsav team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Madam is very friendly and knowledgeable. We have recently visited for my 7 years old kid for some teeth and gum issues . I am highly recommending everyone.

I have been visiting Dr. Goel for quite some time now and as usual was very satisfied with this appointment as well. She explained everything nicely, was very polite like every time. I didn't have to wait. The clinic has moved to a new building which has lift so it couldn't have been better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. R.V. Goel treated me without  any pain which I am always scared for dental treatment. It was completely painless and Doctor Goel always assured that she would stop if I feel any irritation or pain. She explains everything very nicely. I am very happy with her treatment.

I am much more better now. Thanks to Doctor Goel.

Sunetra Dutta

review: I was always nervous about going for RCT treatment but Dr Radhika Goel  explained the entire procedures  in details and  ensured that the whole process was smooth and painless  and most importantly gave me the confidence to go for it and ensured that  I had all my queries answered *** *** ** ** *********  ****** I would recommend  all of them . tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very well mannered, she will listen to you patiently. she is very clear of what needs to be done and will explain the patient calmly about her strategy to address the issue. Her hands are very steady. she gives confidence and calmness to the patient. I have been suffering from recurring gum infection due to an infected root. She removed 2 caps from my rtc and cleaned the area. i will have to go back 4 more times to get the re rtc done. hope it will fix my issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she had been quite gentle in approach, explained fully about the procedure, did immediate relief to my condition. Charges are reasonable and most importantly in this difficult covid times I got an emergency root canal. will visit again soon for my next sitting.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had gone to the doctor on an emergency basis with a severe tooth ache of a molar, the entire experience was so professional it is truly commendable. In these difficult times while maintaining all protocol, Dr Goel completed my tooth extraction so well, that, not for a minute was I worried or tense. I would recommend Dr Goel without any hesitation and wish her and Dentosav all the best for the future. Well done and god bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am really very much pleased with the gentle behaviour and systematic treatment rendered by Dr Goel blended with her nice explanation of my specific problem. The overall protection during this covid-19 period was really praise worthy. Only one request: if the charges were a bit less, it would have been more sympathetical to the common patients specially for the senior citizens like us. Thank you doctor.
